In combination with Oahpa!-nuõrti you can use our Skolt Sámi Web Dictionary with translations to and from different languages:
At present our web dictionary is only in a preliminary state, but the next version will include all words from our multilingual (Finnish, Norwegian, Russian) textbook for beginners.

In the future we plan to work on a more comprehensive dictionary, which will also be combined with grammar tools to recognize inflected words and generate wordform paradigms, in order to show the relevant stem mutations of all words.
Please note that our ressources are at a developmental stage and may contain errors. We work on improving them. If you have comments or criticism, feel free to contact us (oahpa@hum.uit.no).
